title: Multimodal Material Design Strategies for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning environment for elementary education majors and pre-service teachers, focusing on cultivating visualization of mathematical concepts and multimodal resource utilization

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze various multimodal resource types (text, images, videos) to select the most effective combination for explaining mathematical concepts
Learners can apply Cognitive Load Theory to design digital instructional materials for mathematics education
Learners can develop multimodal learning materials suitable for elementary mathematics classroom scenarios through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
